attributes.action: Stop Milberg London LLP vs Steam lawsuit
attributes.additional_details:
Stop this court case, or if you dont stop this, make Milberg London LLP and the activist Vicki Shotbolt, actually liable for any and all games lost when UK gamers Accounts are stopped/banned and the UK is no longer allowed to access steam. 
N.B. This is to show the UK gamers do NOT agree with this case goping forward
attributes.background: Stop this lawsuit, it is being brought on behalf of UK gamers without their knowledge or consent, it is being brought by a childrens rights activist and NOT an actual gamer
